sentences.sContent: Mortimer almost ran headlong into a patrol.
sentences.sCn: 莫蒂默慌不择路，差点撞到巡逻队。

synos.tran: 轻率的；头向前的；匆促而用力的

remMethod.val: head + long → 头很长 → 做事长驱直入不假思索 → 轻率的/地

trans.tranCn: 轻率的/地， 迅猛的/地
trans.tranOther: if you rush headlong into something, you start doing it too quickly without thinking carefully
